ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'FP_Lead', ISPICKVAL(Record_Country__c, 'Myanmar')), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(Phone,"^((\\+95)?\\d{6,10})?$")), NOT(REGEX(Phone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone)), OR( NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone,"^((\\+95)?\\d{6,10})?$")), NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Other_Phone__c)), OR( NOT(REGEX(Other_Phone__c,"^((\\+95)?\\d{6,10})?$")), NOT(REGEX(Other_Phone__c, "\\+[0-9 ]+")) ), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) ) ) , false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add phone in the right format. It should start with +95 and be followed by 6 - 10 digits, without space
